data.title: Rhine River Cruise
data.meta_description: Join alumni, friends, and President Cindy and John Gnadinger on this exciting 10-day tour from Athens to Athens! Blue skies—nothin’ but blue skies. Oh, and blue roofs, blue windows, and the bluest sea you will ever see.
data.text:
July 10-17, 2025

Join alumni, President Cindy and John Gnadinger, and friends on this exciting 7-day cruise on the Rhine River with AmaWaterways. Contoured by vineyard-clad hills and castles from yesteryear, the legendary Rhine captivates. Experience the allure of France’s Alsace region in its welcoming capital, Strasbourg, and its priceless gem, Riquewihr. Discover Breisach, rising above the vineyards of the Rhine, and Freiburg, one of Germany’s sunniest cities and gateway to the Black Forest. Fabled towns lost in time present you with the chance to taste local flavors—Rüdesheimer coffee and legendary German beer—and to touch history up close with guided hikes and bike rides. From Amsterdam’s colorful canals to the majestic Swiss Alps, journey into the heart of the destinations you visit. Countries visited: France, Germany, Netherlands, and Switzerland.

Cost

$4,229.00 per person, double occupancy, cabin category CA.

Single cabins available, single supplement applies.

Other cabin categories available, prices vary, subject to availability.

Land Arrangements:

Available for an additional cost.

2-Nights Pre-Cruise in Amsterdam $782.00 per person, double occupancy. Single supplement $414.

4-Nights Post-Cruise in Lucerne and Zurich, Switzerland $1,657.00 per person, double occupancy. Single supplement $829.

7-Day River Cruise Itinerary Includes:

Accommodation during the cruise.

Daily shore excursions during the cruise with English-speaking expert guides. Use of Quietvox headsets is also included.

Gourmet meals onboard (Early Riser Coffee and Croissants, a Rich Breakfast, a Festive Lunch, Afternoon Tea & Coffee with cake, cookies & sandwiches and a Multi-Course-Dinner). Choice of dining options at no additional cost including the Main Dining Salon and an intimate Chef’s Table Restaurant where the Chef prepares the meal in person.

Free flowing red and white wine from the local regions, beer or soft drinks for lunch & dinner.

Captain’s Welcome Champagne Reception and Gala Dinner and Captain’s Farewell Champagne Reception and Gala Dinner plus several theme-dinners.

Complimentary cocktail hour offering a “Happy Hour Menu” on five evenings one hour before dinner (Captain’s Receptions on the other two evenings).

Coffee, tea, ice-water and iced-tea are included all day. Cappuccino, latte and espresso can be requested free of charge during all meals!

Bottled water, fluffy bathrobes and slippers are provided in each cabin.

Use of fitness room and equipment.

Daily wellness and fitness program with qualified fitness instructor.

Use of the swimming pool on the Sun Deck. Use of the AMA bicycles and helmets in each port.

Complimentary in-cabin movies.

Unlimited Internet onboard – strictly subject to availability.

Nightly piano music; also during Afternoon Tea & Coffee Time.

Services of our professional English-speaking Cruise Director.

Exclusions:

International airfare.

Travel insurance.

Airport transfers.

Pre- or post-cruise land arrangements.

All other beverages except the ones mentioned above.

Use of the telephone in each cabin.

Items purchased in the Gift Shop or other personal charges (i.e. hair salon services or massages).

Optional shore excursions offered in addition to our daily included shore excursion program.

Booking Process:

10% per person deposit is due upon booking to confirm your spot. Limited spots are available on a first- come, first served basis! Book ASAP to reserve. Final payment due February 5, 2025. All payments are non-refundable, travel insurance is strongly recommended. Ask us how to save 3% on your booking!

Ready to book?

Complete this Booking Form

Upon receipt of your Booking Form, Wendy Radmer from Travel Leaders will contact you to confirm your requests and provide you with a personalized quote. Once you approve the quote, you will receive a Vacation Agreement via SignNow to collect your payment information. After completing the Vacation Agreement, Wendy will make the reservation on your behalf and provide you with an invoice from Travel Leaders. Once all of these steps are completed you will be confirmed on the 2025 Carroll University Alumni Trip.

Itinerary

https://www.amawaterways.com/destination/europe-river-cruises/2025/captivating-rhine

The Ship
